name: Ludo Star
description:
Ludo Star is the first game developed and released by ETH.GAME using SDK. It is a classic aeroplane chess gameplay with several modes such as Lucky7, Monopoly, Quick, etc.

The game was developed for mobile and tablet users. The Ludo Star game gives players a chance to play without spending money. The game is fast and appeals to players eager for competition. 

Ludo Star is designed friendly to Web2 players so they can easily access the game, learn crypto gameplay like NFT, token, and staking in an easy-to-understand and fun way, and gradually appreciate the charm of Web3. Meanwhile, we have successfully realized external revenue by innovatively introducing the advertising function in this game, as an experiment to create a healthy economic system.
